results.content: Mosh is easy to understand and follow....this is great course and goes well with my morning coffee.   I'm a seasoned Angular developer and still got some good techniques from this course (esp in the redux section).  Even if you don't care about firebase b/c you have different use cases, there are plenty of goodies here.  I'm looking forward to more in-depth classes in Angular Mosh...keep them coming!
results.content_html: Mosh is easy to understand and follow....this is great course and goes well with my morning coffee. I'm a seasoned Angular developer and still got some good techniques from this course (esp in the redux section). Even if you don't care about firebase b/c you have different use cases, there are plenty of goodies here. I'm looking forward to more in-depth classes in Angular Mosh...keep them coming!

results.content:
NoSQL-Datenbanken funktionieren deutlich anders als SQL-Datenbanken. Die Standard-CRUD-Operationen + die set-Funktion wird im ersten Abschnitt sehr einfach  dargestellt.
Aber vor allem werden die komplexeren Funktionen, wie z.B. Join, Filter oder Multiple Updates in einem sehr einfach & praktischen Zusammenhang dargestellt.
Dies ist sehr praxisnah und hilfreich, auch wenn man komplexere Anwendungen als dieses einfach Beispiel programmieren will.
results.content_html:
NoSQL-Datenbanken funktionieren deutlich anders als SQL-Datenbanken. Die Standard-CRUD-Operationen + die set-Funktion wird im ersten Abschnitt sehr einfach dargestellt.
Aber vor allem werden die komplexeren Funktionen, wie z.B. Join, Filter oder Multiple Updates in einem sehr einfach & praktischen Zusammenhang dargestellt.
Dies ist sehr praxisnah und hilfreich, auch wenn man komplexere Anwendungen als dieses einfach Beispiel programmieren will.

results.content:
This is the perfect course for anyone trying to use Angular in a Production/Enterprise scenario. Even if you do not use FireBase, Ionic or ASP.NET the way this course is taught allows you to use the same concepts for other stacks you may have such as ReThinkDB, MSSQL, etc.
I was looking for a course to teach the next level of Angular once you got the basics and this was definitely it! Thanks Mosh.
results.content_html:
This is the perfect course for anyone trying to use Angular in a Production/Enterprise scenario. Even if you do not use FireBase, Ionic or ASP.NET the way this course is taught allows you to use the same concepts for other stacks you may have such as ReThinkDB, MSSQL, etc.
I was looking for a course to teach the next level of Angular once you got the basics and this was definitely it! Thanks Mosh.

results.content:
Der Kurs ist wie gewohnt sehr gut und bringt die Inhalte klar und überzeugend auf den Punkt.
Mosh hat aktuellere Kurse, in welche er auch Inhalte von diesem hier reingebracht hat, so dass ich diesen Kurs als Ergänzung zu den akuellen Kursen sehe. Denn vieles hat sich inzwischen bei firebase verändert, wer das alte angular-cli nicht mehr installieren will, weil das neuere angular/cli schon installiert ist,  dann kann man den Kurs anhören und verzichtet dann einfach auf das mitprogrammieren. Sicherlich ist der Kurs so eine wertvolle Bereicherung.

results.content:
After completing Mosh's first Angular course, I went on to this course. I really love Mosh's style to explain things. And yes - in this course he just keeps the teaching quality up high. 
The examples are well chosen, Mosh introduces 3rd party frameworks that could be very relevant (even in Business Applications) and after completing this course I really feel confident that I know how to code clean Angular 2.
results.content_html:
After completing Mosh's first Angular course, I went on to this course. I really love Mosh's style to explain things. And yes - in this course he just keeps the teaching quality up high.
The examples are well chosen, Mosh introduces 3rd party frameworks that could be very relevant (even in Business Applications) and after completing this course I really feel confident that I know how to code clean Angular 2.

results.content: I was never disappointed Mosh, he is a great teacher so i can recommend all of his courses. I learned a lot from his courses.
results.content_html: I was never disappointed Mosh, he is a great teacher so i can recommend all of his courses. I learned a lot from his courses.

results.content: Great instructor. I was a little disappointed in Ionic Authentication with social networking. I've registered for Udemy's course on Ionic 3 to learn more with the idea of building an authenticated app. No blame I also attended an Ionic Meetup and most I've discussed used email as to login. What I'm having difficulty is debugging past the Ionic serve version and into the Ionic View where I get a white screen and I can't debug why the social popup fails. I also may have to pay Apple $$ to renew my iOS dev account I was waiting until I had an app to join. Anyway great work! Matt
results.content_html: Great instructor. I was a little disappointed in Ionic Authentication with social networking. I've registered for Udemy's course on Ionic 3 to learn more with the idea of building an authenticated app. No blame I also attended an Ionic Meetup and most I've discussed used email as to login. What I'm having difficulty is debugging past the Ionic serve version and into the Ionic View where I get a white screen and I can't debug why the social popup fails. I also may have to pay Apple $$ to renew my iOS dev account I was waiting until I had an app to join. Anyway great work! Matt

results.content:
There's no other rating for a Mosh's course, this course is incredibly interesting, and every subject keeps me hooked, I would like to hear some drawbacks of technologies as Firebase(I read bad feelings about it on the web) and Auth0, I noticed the tendency of use this technologies in small projects and startups but not in large applications, I'm aware that does not exist the technology that fits 100% of scenarios and projects though. 

Notice: Just the redux part makes the investment absolutely be worth.
results.content_html:

Notice: Just the redux part makes the investment absolutely be worth.

results.content: This is not the first tutorial I have done with Mosh as the instructor.  It is as expected very good!  Very clear and he explains everything in easy to understand terms.  I am very happy with his choice of technologies in as far as what he is pairing Angular 2/4 with.  I am also using .Net Core on the back and ng2-redux for my redux pattern / state.  I have not gotten all the way through this course yet but so far it's been excellent.  I had no experience with Firebase and am not disappointed his presentation of it.  I may use it in a future application. :-)
results.content_html: This is not the first tutorial I have done with Mosh as the instructor. It is as expected very good! Very clear and he explains everything in easy to understand terms. I am very happy with his choice of technologies in as far as what he is pairing Angular 2/4 with. I am also using .Net Core on the back and ng2-redux for my redux pattern / state. I have not gotten all the way through this course yet but so far it's been excellent. I had no experience with Firebase and am not disappointed his presentation of it. I may use it in a future application. :-)

results.content: I love how Mosh explains from the bottom up. My experience is pretty advanced, but still I don't get irritated at his quick and to-the-point analogies. I actually find that a lot of the things I have been using for years are now explained to me in a way that I wished on 'past-me'. It would have saved a lot of time and struggles!

results.content:
This course uses heavily outdated versions of Firebase and AngularFire and no longer works with the current version of Angular. The code shown in the lecture does no longer work. Ng compiler dies on the first attempt (sic transit gloria mundi!).
Several students have complained about this problem already 5 months ago, but so far there has been no reaction from the teacher.
This course needs to be updated urgently or to be removed from the Udemy site!
Interesting idea (Angular+Firebase) but very poor implementation.

results.content: I love how the videos are zoomed in so you could even watch on a small phone. I love how his example projects are bare bones so that all the code is the essentials to explain the topic... no extra clutter/complexity to get in the way. If you need to learn about Firebase, this course includes it in very good detail. Just the bit on how to link 2 databases together is worth the price of admission. Also love the inclusion of Ionic. I still have a long way to go in the course but I feel confident already to give this 5 stars.
results.content_html: I love how the videos are zoomed in so you could even watch on a small phone. I love how his example projects are bare bones so that all the code is the essentials to explain the topic... no extra clutter/complexity to get in the way. If you need to learn about Firebase, this course includes it in very good detail. Just the bit on how to link 2 databases together is worth the price of admission. Also love the inclusion of Ionic. I still have a long way to go in the course but I feel confident already to give this 5 stars.

results.content:
Mosh's courses have many unique values - firstly, on the screen you are only seeing those lines of code that are currently being discussed, so you don't have to struggle on mobile devices to see something.

Furthermore, Mosh speaks in a very clearly manner and the volume is on a proper level. But the most important is that the courses are well thought before the recording, which guarantees that in each chapter we are focused on a selected task and are developing features clearly stated. There is no mind-wandering, constant "errr", "hmmm" and other signs that the tutor is creating content ad-hoc.

I've bought courses from many different places & tutors yet Moshs' are far the best ones!
results.content_html:
Mosh's courses have many unique values - firstly, on the screen you are only seeing those lines of code that are currently being discussed, so you don't have to struggle on mobile devices to see something.

Furthermore, Mosh speaks in a very clearly manner and the volume is on a proper level. But the most important is that the courses are well thought before the recording, which guarantees that in each chapter we are focused on a selected task and are developing features clearly stated. There is no mind-wandering, constant "errr", "hmmm" and other signs that the tutor is creating content ad-hoc.

I've bought courses from many different places & tutors yet Moshs' are far the best ones!

results.content:
Mosh is an awesome teacher and highly skilled and knowledgeable engineer. As always, great value provided. If you're not acquainted with Firebase, you'll learn a whole lot.

However, so far Firebase is all I'm getting and I feel like the course has the wrong title. Maybe should be called something to do with Firebase. So far it's almost all review for me. I took another course on here about AngularFire2 and they covered this stuff pretty well, though Mosh is helping flesh out the depth of my understanding.

I must say for mostly review, it's been some stellar review. I feel like some core concepts are being clarified for me and, as always with Mosh, I feel like seeing his approach to things makes me a better coder overall. I'm sure he'll get into things other than Firebase and my rating will probably go up.
results.content_html:
Mosh is an awesome teacher and highly skilled and knowledgeable engineer. As always, great value provided. If you're not acquainted with Firebase, you'll learn a whole lot.

However, so far Firebase is all I'm getting and I feel like the course has the wrong title. Maybe should be called something to do with Firebase. So far it's almost all review for me. I took another course on here about AngularFire2 and they covered this stuff pretty well, though Mosh is helping flesh out the depth of my understanding.

I must say for mostly review, it's been some stellar review. I feel like some core concepts are being clarified for me and, as always with Mosh, I feel like seeing his approach to things makes me a better coder overall. I'm sure he'll get into things other than Firebase and my rating will probably go up.

results.content: not really much on how angular 2 apps work or function mostly just a firebase class at this point and just paint by numbers just type what I type thing.  Now Mosh does a good job at explaining the firebase aspect and the angular fire library. I was hoping for an explanation of angular 2 and what all the files are and mean.  I have a pretty good background on angular 1.x and took this class hoping to get up to speed on how to use angular 2

response.content:
Hi Adam,

I'm sorry you couldn't find what you were looking for. But the explanation of files and how Angular works belongs to a beginner course on Angular, not to this course. As I explained in the prerequisites, you should be already familiar with Angular before taking this course. This course just covers the advanced topics that you neee to know in building enterprise apps.

results.content:
Mosh RULEZ! :)

You where played a big part in my personal decision to switch job from IT-manager to Software Engineer. It is because of your great courses i gained the necessary  knowledge.

I start my new career in Jan 2019. Thank you!  (Since i have 2 big projects that needs some closure before i leave)

Maybe ill lose some money in the proccess short term but hey, work to live, dont live to work! :)
